saffaryDescription: Saffary is one of Bahrain's leading FoodTech Platform for Hyperlocal Market.
address: OFFICE 22, BLDG 661, RD 1208, BLOCK 712 - SALMABAD, KINGDOM OF BAHRAIN
find_nearby_merchant_description: We help you to connect with nearby merchants in a single click.
no_commission_description: We don’t charge any commission from merchants, so you get the same price mentioned on their menu card.
easy_access_menu_description: No more calls asking “What’s on the menu?”. Access the complete menu & place your order with a single click, whether it's your favorite Shawarma or Machboos!
eat_now_pay_later_description: We have also enabled digital khata in this app so one can clear their dues on a monthly basis.
quick_delivery_description: Since merchants are located nearby, you don’t have to wait more for delivery. Take-away, Dining & Delivery options are also available.
explore_description: All important updates related to your business park or nearby area are published under the “Explore” section on a daily basis.
address: OFFICE 22, BLDG 661, RD 1208, BLOCK 712 - SALMABAD, KINGDOM OF BAHRAIN
marketsDescription: Saffary has rapidly grown to become a leading online FoodTech platform with operations in various cities in Bahrain.
saffaryDescription: Saffary is one of Bahrain's leading FoodTech Platform for Hyperlocal Market.
saffaryDetails: Saffary is an innovative solution for anyone who wants to have coffee, snacks & instant bites/meals from nearby merchants. Through Saffary App, anyone can access a list of items provided by nearby merchants who have partnered with Saffary and can easily place an order with 3 simple & easy steps.
conceptValidation: Our concept has been validated, and we are already generating significant traction at our pilot site, which is in the capital governorate, Manama. Our aim is to expand this model to all such places in Bahrain at the kick start.
storyContent1: In the year 2019 our founder Vineet Singh Kashyap met with an accident with our local chaiwala vendor as he was not able to deliver tea in our office on time. On the same day Vineet asked him about his concerns and decided to build a tech based platform for him so that chaiwala can manage his deliveries smoothly
storyContent2: As soon as Vineet started with the road map COVID-19 hit the global market and almost all offices got closed. But the problem of chaiwala was so real that in COVID times only Vineet started working on its planning
storyContent3: Vineet wanted to keep a simple but easy to recall brand name and one day he came across a very trending word ‘CORONA’ in COVID times and from that he planned to name this product as Saffary and gave tagline as Saffary se order Saffary na!’.
storyContent4: When Vineet was working on this product he realised that this is a common problem for everyone who is going to the office on a daily basis and if they want to order anything along with tea/coffee then they don’t have any option by calling local merchants and asking to deliver product in their office
storyContent5: Considering all these factors we decided to focus on instant food delivery along with tea-coffee.
storyContent6: In the month of Dec 2021 most of the offices got started and we were also ready with MVP version of Mobile App so started approaching nearby merchants to onboard them on our platform. But unfortunately considering the new concept no merchant has shown any interest in our product and we were not able to onboard any merchant by mid of Feb 2022.
registerDescription: Register yourself on the Saffary app and choose your location by enabling location permission or by choosing manual.
findNearbyMerchantDescription: If any merchant is associated with us, they will be listed under 'Nearby Merchant'.
provideDeliveryAddressDescription: On the cart page, you will be asked to enter your delivery address. Verified addresses can place orders without validation.
orderDetailsTrackDescription: All order details will be shown under the 'History' tab. You can also track your orders or seek help through the provided options.
digitalAccountDescription: Under the Account section, you can see month-wise pending dues from your merchants and track the status of payments.

hero.heading1: Craving Bahraini Machboos but no time to cook?
hero.heading2: Want to enjoy a fresh Shawarma but can't go out?
hero.heading3: Need groceries delivered to your doorstep in Bahrain?
hero.heading4: Thinking of having homemade Bahraini snacks?
hero.heading5: Craving fresh dates or fruits without stepping out?
hero.description: Saffary is one of Bahrain's leading FoodTech Platforms for the Hyperlocal Market.
